column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The other interesting factoid about this well appointed spanish themed venue
column2: is that they offer an unbeatable deal for New Years Day. If you show up in your pajamas on the first day of the year
column3: they'll provide a gift card in the amount that you spent. My friends call it eating your bill. The only catch is make a reservation... and invest in some warm pajamas!
